name: Power Plant
description:
You are a robot helping an elderly woman with her malnourished garden, but you only have a limited amount of power to get around

The title screen uses the mouse. In game, you use the arrow keys to navigate the garden and the space key to advance dialogue.

A game by:

Autumn Greenley@autumnotopiadev on TwitterVee Nowellveeartblog on TumblrEvan Rechsteinergeistder on Itch.ioLuke Rossback@lucasmaxbros on TwitterAndrew Tran@bearlovingnerd on Twitter
